verses.verse: Unto you <S%H430><s%>, O God, do we give thanks <S%H3034><s%>, unto you do we give thanks <S%H3034><s%>: for that your name <S%H8034><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> your wondrous works <S%H6381><s%> declare <S%H5608><s%>.
When I shall receive <S%H3947><s%> the congregation <S%H4150><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> uprightly <S%H4339><s%>.
The earth <S%H776><s%> and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> there are dissolved <S%H4127><s%>: I carry up <S%H8505><s%> the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of it <S%H5542><s%>. Selah.
I said <S%H559><s%> unto the fools <S%H1984><s%>, Deal not foolishly <S%H1984><s%>: and to the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Lift not up <S%H7311><s%> the horn <S%H7161><s%>:
Lift not up <S%H7311><s%> your horn <S%H7161><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>: speak <S%H1696><s%> not with a stiff <S%H6277><s%> neck <S%H6677><s%>.
For promotion <S%H7311><s%> comes neither from the east <S%H4161><s%>, nor from the west <S%H4628><s%>, nor from the south <S%H4057><s%>.
But God <S%H430><s%> is the judge <S%H8199><s%>: he puts down <S%H8213><s%> one <S%H7311><s%>, and sets up another.

For in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> there is a cup <S%H3563><s%>, and the wine <S%H3196><s%> is red <S%H2560><s%>; it is full <S%H4392><s%> of mixture <S%H4538><s%>; and he pours out <S%H5064><s%> of the same <S%H2088><s%>: but the dregs <S%H8105><s%> there <S%H7563><s%>, all the wicked of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall wring them out <S%H4680><s%>, and drink them <S%H8354><s%>.
But I will declare <S%H5046><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
All the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> also will I cut off <S%H1438><s%>; but the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%>.
